Document: # Space Law: Controlled Substances - \[Chemists/Science\] Explosive and pyrotechnic compounds excluding welding fuel contained in welders or welding fuel storage vessels - \[Science\] Toxins - \[Medical\] Chloral hydrate, Impedrezene, Ipecac, and Pax - \[Medical\] Desoxyephedrine and Ephedrine - \[None\] Mindbreaker toxin - \[None\] Mute toxin - \[None\] Nocturine - \[None\] Norepinephirc acid - \[None\] Romerol - \[None\] Space Mirage - \[None\] Stimulants, excluding Desoxyephedrine and Ephedrine
